label: FareRuleActivity
text: Overstay Rule: A passenger holding a valid ticket can exit from same station within 20 minutes and from other stations within 120 minutes. For overstaying in paid area of Namma Metro beyond these limits penalty of Rs.10/- per hour is charged subject to a maximum of Rs.50/-. => Mismatch: The Automatic Gates record entry/ exit details in token / Smart card. Every entry at these gates must be followed by proper exit through the gates on same day. Skipping of any entry or exit is termed as MISMATCH. The penalty for mismatch is Rs.10/-. => Penalty for ticketless travel or lost ticket is Rs.50/- apart from maximum token fare. => Minimum Fare will be charged for entering into a station. => The Automatic Gates admit one person at a time. Hence every passenger needs to carry one token or smart card. => Tickets are not required for children below 3 feet. No age criteria is considered. => Fare Rules Bangalore Metro
